Literature.Title: Structural determinants of antimicrobial and antiplasmodial activity and selectivity in histidine-rich amphipathic cationic peptides.
Literature.Author: Mason AJ, Moussaoui W, Abdelrahman T, Boukhari A, Bertani P, Marquette A, Shooshtarizaheh P, Moulay G, Boehm N, Guerold B, Sawers RJ, Kichler A, Metz-Boutigue MH, Candolfi E, Prévost G, Bechinger B

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=89.6 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5:50% Cell death=89.1±10.6 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5 SV2:50% Cell death=36.6±2.6 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli RSO 2(MIC=5.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 52156(MIC=11.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>11.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=4.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=11.2µM),Neurospora crassa(MIC=3.125µM),Aspergillus fumigatus(MIC=>50µM),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans(MIC=50µM),Candida tropicalis(MIC=0.75µM),Plasmodium falciparum(IC50=17µM)
